SELECT COM_DET_CODE, COM_CODE, COM_DET_CODE_NM, COM_DET_CODE_RM FROM COM_DET_CODE_INFO WHERE COM_CODE = #{comCode}

SELECT frcs_ownr_no, frcs_ownr_email, frcs_ownr_pw, frcs_ownr_nm, frcs_ownr_brdt, frcs_ownr_tel, frcs_ownr_zip, frcs_ownr_addr, frcs_ownr_dtl_addr, frcs_ownr_join_dt, enabled FROM frcs_owner WHERE frcs_ownr_no=#{frcsOwnrNo}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(FRCS_NO)+1,0)+1 FROM FRANCHISE
INSERT INTO franchise ( frcs_no, frcs_nm, frcs_post_no, frcs_addr, frcs_dtl_addr, frcs_ctrt_cncls_dt, frcs_ownr_no, frcs_region_cd ) VALUES ( #{frcsNo}, #{frcsNm}, #{frcsPostNo}, #{frcsAddr}, #{frcsDtlAddr}, SYSDATE, #{frcsOwnrNo}, #{frcsRegionCd} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM FRANCHISE order by FRCS_RGST_DT desc

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.FRCS_NO, A.FRCS_NM, A.FRCS_STS_CD, A.FRCS_RGST_DT, A.FRCS_END_DT, A.FRCS_POST_NO, A.FRCS_ADDR, A.FRCS_DTL_ADDR, A.FRCS_BSNS_STRT_TM, A.FRCS_BSNS_END_TM, A.FRCS_CTRT_CNCLS_DT, A.FRCS_EXPT_CMPL_DT, A.FRCS_FNL_INSP_DT, A.FRCS_OPNG_DT, A.FRCS_CPCT_PSN, A.FRCS_OWNR_NO, A.FRCS_REGION_CD, A.FRCS_TEL, B.FRCS_OWNR_EMAIL, B.FRCS_OWNR_PW, B.FRCS_OWNR_NM, B.FRCS_OWNR_BRDT, B.FRCS_OWNR_TEL, B.FRCS_OWNR_ZIP, B.FRCS_OWNR_ADDR, B.FRCS_OWNR_DTL_ADDR, B.FRCS_OWNR_JOIN_DT, B.ENABLED FROM franchise A , frcs_owner B WHERE A.FRCS_OWNR_NO = B.FRCS_OWNR_NO AND A.FRCS_STS_CD = #{comDetCode}

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, A.FRCS_NO, A.FRCS_NM, A.FRCS_STS_CD, A.FRCS_RGST_DT, A.FRCS_END_DT, A.FRCS_POST_NO, A.FRCS_ADDR, A.FRCS_DTL_ADDR, A.FRCS_BSNS_STRT_TM, A.FRCS_BSNS_END_TM, A.FRCS_CTRT_CNCLS_DT, A.FRCS_EXPT_CMPL_DT, A.FRCS_FNL_INSP_DT, A.FRCS_OPNG_DT, A.FRCS_CPCT_PSN, A.FRCS_OWNR_NO, A.FRCS_REGION_CD, A.FRCS_TEL, B.FRCS_OWNR_EMAIL, B.FRCS_OWNR_PW, B.FRCS_OWNR_NM, B.FRCS_OWNR_BRDT, B.FRCS_OWNR_TEL, B.FRCS_OWNR_ZIP, B.FRCS_OWNR_ADDR, B.FRCS_OWNR_DTL_ADDR, B.FRCS_OWNR_JOIN_DT, B.ENABLED,B.FRCS_OWNER_OJT, C.OJT_NO,C.OJT_SN, C.OJT_STR_TIME, C.OJT_END_TIME, C.OJT_TYPE, C.OJT_YN, C.OJT_SCORE FROM franchise A , frcs_owner B, ojt C WHERE A.FRCS_OWNR_NO = B.FRCS_OWNR_NO AND B.FRCS_OWNER_OJT = C.OJT_NO(+) AND A.FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo}
mapper.update:
Update FRANCHISE SET
FRCS_CTRT_CNCLS_DT = TO_DATE('${end}','YYYY-MM-DD')
FRCS_FNL_INSP_DT = TO_DATE('${end}','YYYY-MM-DD')
FRCS_EXPT_CMPL_DT = TO_DATE('${end}','YYYY-MM-DD')
FRCS_OPNG_DT = TO_DATE('${end}','YYYY-MM-DD')
WHERE FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo}
UPDATE FRANCHISE SET FRCS_BSNS_STRT_TM = #{frcsBsnsStrtTm}, FRCS_BSNS_END_TM = #{frcsBsnsEndTm} , FRCS_CPCT_PSN = #{frcsCpctPsn}, FRCS_TEL = #{frcsTel} WHERE FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo}
mapper.select: SELECT com_det_code, com_code, com_det_code_nm, com_det_code_rm FROM com_det_code_info WHERE com_code= #{comCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE FRANCHISE SET FRCS_NM = #{frcsNm}, FRCS_TEL = #{frcsTel}, FRCS_POST_NO = #{frcsPostNo}, FRCS_ADDR = #{frcsAddr}, FRCS_DTL_ADDR = #{frcsDtlAddr}, FRCS_BSNS_STRT_TM = #{frcsBsnsStrtTm}, FRCS_BSNS_END_TM = #{frcsBsnsEndTm}, FRCS_CPCT_PSN = #{frcsCpctPsn}, FRCS_CTRT_CNCLS_DT = #{frcsCtrtCnclsDt}, FRCS_END_DT = #{frcsEndDt}, FRCS_EXPT_CMPL_DT = #{frcsExptCmplDt}, FRCS_FNL_INSP_DT = #{frcsFnlInspDt}, FRCS_OPNG_DT = #{frcsOpngDt}, FRCS_STS_CD = #{frcsStsCd} WHERE FRCS_OWNR_NO = #{frcsNo}
mapper.select:
SELECT f.frcs_no, f.frcs_nm, f.frcs_opng_dt,f.frcs_ownr_no , sum(p.pynm_total_amt) as total FROM franchise f, payment p WHERE frcs_sts_cd = #{comDetCode} and f.frcs_no = p.frcs_no(+)
group by f.frcs_no, f.frcs_nm , f.frcs_opng_dt ,f.frcs_ownr_no order by sum(p.pynm_total_amt) desc

SELECT TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'MM') AS "월", TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) / 1000), 'FM999,999,999,999') AS "월매출" FROM payment WHERE PYNM_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE('2023-01-01', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE('2023-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'MM') ORDER BY "월"

SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(monthly_total) /1000 )/ COUNT(*), 'FM999,999,999,999,999') AS monthlyTotal, ROUND(SUM(monthly_total) , -3) AS sumMonthlyTotal FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'MM') AS "월", SUM(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT) AS monthly_total FROM payment WHERE PYNM_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'MM') )

select FRCS_NO ,FRCS_NM ,FRCS_STS_CD ,FRCS_RGST_DT ,FRCS_END_DT ,FRCS_POST_NO ,FRCS_ADDR ,FRCS_DTL_ADDR ,FRCS_BSNS_STRT_TM ,FRCS_BSNS_END_TM ,FRCS_CTRT_CNCLS_DT ,FRCS_EXPT_CMPL_DT ,FRCS_FNL_INSP_DT ,FRCS_OPNG_DT ,FRCS_CPCT_PSN ,FRCS_OWNR_NO ,FRCS_REGION_CD ,FRCS_TEL from franchise where frcs_no = #{frcsNo}
select frcs_no,sum(frcs_emp_sal) from frcs_employee where frcs_no = #{frcsNo} and FRCS_EMP_WKST_CD= 'CWST01' group by frcs_no

SELECT RY_CLM_YM, SUM(RY_TOTAL_AMT) as "총납부금액", SUM(RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT) as "가맹비", SUM(RY_ORDER_AMT) as "제품 구입비", SUM(RY_ROYALTY_AMT) as "로열티" FROM royalty WHERE TO_DATE(RY_CLM_YM, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') +1 AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY RY_CLM_YM

WITH Z AS( SELECT T.RY_CLM_YM, T.PYNM_TOTAL_AMT , S.RY_ORDER_AMT, U.FRCS_EMP_SAL, S.RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT, S.RY_ROYALTY_AMT, Q.GONGASUM , (S.RY_ORDER_AMT + U.FRCS_EMP_SAL + S.RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT + S.RY_ROYALTY_AMT + Q.GONGASUM) TOTAL_COST , T.PYNM_TOTAL_AMT - (S.RY_ORDER_AMT + U.FRCS_EMP_SAL + S.RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT + S.RY_ROYALTY_AMT + Q.GONGASUM) SONEIK FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') RY_CLM_YM, ROUND(SUM(PYNM_TOTAL_AMT)) AS PYNM_TOTAL_AMT FROM payment WHERE PYNM_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') +1 AND frcs_no = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(PYNM_DT, 'YYYY-MM') ) T, ( SELECT RY_CLM_YM, SUM(RY_TOTAL_AMT) as RY_TOTAL_AMT, SUM(RY_ORDER_AMT) as RY_ORDER_AMT, SUM(RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT) as RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT, SUM(RY_ROYALTY_AMT) as RY_ROYALTY_AMT FROM royalty WHERE TO_DATE(RY_CLM_YM, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') +1 AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} GROUP BY RY_CLM_YM ) S, ( select sum(frcs_emp_sal) frcs_emp_sal from frcs_employee where frcs_no = #{frcsNo} and FRCS_EMP_WKST_CD= 'CWST01' group by frcs_no ) U, ( SELECT DUES_CLM_YM AS RY_CLM_YM, (DUES_ELECTRIC_AMT + DUES_WATER_AMT + DUES_GAS_AMT + DUES_MTRT_AMT) AS GONGASUM FROM PUBLICDUES WHERE TO_DATE(DUES_CLM_YM, 'YYYY-MM') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1 AND FRCS_NO = #{frcsNo} )Q WHERE T.RY_CLM_YM = S.RY_CLM_YM AND T.RY_CLM_YM = Q.RY_CLM_YM ) SELECT CASE WHEN GROUPING(Z.RY_CLM_YM) = 1 THEN 'Total' ELSE Z.RY_CLM_YM END AS ryCklmYm, ROUND(SUM(Z.PYNM_TOTAL_AMT), -3) AS pynmTotalAmt, ROUND(SUM(Z.RY_ORDER_AMT), -3) AS ryOrderAmt, ROUND(SUM(Z.FRCS_EMP_SAL), -3) AS frcsEmpSal, ROUND(SUM(Z.RY_FRCS_FEE_AMT), -3) AS ryFrcsFeeAmt, ROUND(SUM(Z.RY_ROYALTY_AMT), -3) AS ryRoyaltyAmt, ROUND(SUM(Z.GONGASUM), -3) AS gonga, ROUND(SUM(Z.TOTAL_COST), -3) AS totalCost, ROUND(SUM(Z.SONEIK), -3) AS soneik, ROUND((SUM(Z.SONEIK) / NULLIF(SUM(Z.PYNM_TOTAL_AMT), 0) * 100), 2) AS soneikRate FROM Z GROUP BY ROLLUP(Z.RY_CLM_YM)
